name: The Game of Theseus
description:
A little prototype about traversing a maze. Made using Pico-8. The game is based on Greek Mythology and the music is heavily inspired from Doubt Comes In from Hadestown. Everything else is me.

Controls are Arrow Keys.

I made this for a jam, but I'd like to continue working on it! Let me know via comment or DM if you have any suggestion or criticism! I'm always looking to improve :)
